data.text:
@jamisonfoser Why Mainstream Media Are So Right Wing Biased and How to Change That

https://t.co/N0WzTKrXMN

@MountainBark @jamisonfoser It exists but doesn’t affect most people so everyone is tired of doing unnecessary stuff to appease the people that are afraid. It’s like wearing a life jacket on the bumper boat ride. Not necessary for most people.

@web_rant @jamisonfoser @Atrios It’s not killing everyone randomly. Those who need the vaccine get it. Those that don’t need it don’t need to get it. Know your risks and act accordingly. Most don’t people need anything.
@ebongreen @jamisonfoser Dumb analogy. Fire kills everyone. Covid does not effect everyone the same. Most don’t need masks or vaccines. Most will be ok.
@jamisonfoser Your analogy is bad. Everyone needs heat. Most people don’t NEED masks.

@jamisonfoser Haven’t been wearing a mask this whole time and still living. I did get it but as with most people it’s gone so the mask is not necessary for most people (some but not most). Stop being afraid. Most will be ok and have been ok. The population is still growing not shrinking.
@jamisonfoser Pretend it doesn't exist has always been the mantra for problem solving. Systemic racism, sexism, etc all chalked up as solved and or doesn't exist.
@mikethemadbiol The (extra) bizarre thing is they people to whom this makes sense will also insist that they’re just Using Logic And Rational Thought

@jamisonfoser @Atrios If 2 years and more than a million dead in this pandemic have taught us anything it's that the interests of concentrated capital making a killing come first.

Public health is not the priority. Which also explains our health care system.
